review: Finally broke down and got a new one after my original crybaby bought in 1976 finally died. A great pedal, well made!
Can't get your banjo to sound right without a great set of finger and thumb picks. have been using these for years now.
My favorite strings for 30 years. Have used D'Addario strings since the late 70's. Always a great sound at a great price.
Every guitarist needs a volume pedal at some point in a gig. THe Behringer Preamplifier/Volume booster pedal is an inexpensive yet quality volume pedal that works great!
Love these guitar stands! Sturdy and compact and at such a reasonable price. You will pay up to 4x more for similar stands! Great bargain.
Using the string cleaner on a regular basis helps to prolong string life and keeps your guitar sounding bright and full. A repeat buy!
